projects.title: Spray Center Website
projects.description: Responsive full stack web application for a service business using React.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and SQL.
projects.longDescription: A complete e-commerce platform for a local business to showcase services, manage bookings, and handle customer inquiries. Features include responsive design, admin dashboard, and payment integration.

projects.title: Kids Learning App
projects.description: Interactive multi-screen mobile app with lessons, quizzes, and animations using Flutter and Firebase.
projects.longDescription: An educational mobile application designed for children to learn through interactive lessons, engaging quizzes, and fun animations. Includes progress tracking and parental controls.

projects.title: University Management System
projects.description: Console-based student and course management system with C++ and SQL using data structures like linked lists and trees.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive system for managing university operations including student enrollment, course management, and grade tracking using advanced data structures.

projects.title: ATM Simulation System
projects.description: ATM simulation in C++ with account management, PIN validation, transactions, and OOP concepts.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive ATM system simulator demonstrating object-oriented programming principles with features like account management, secure PIN validation, and multiple transaction types.

projects.title: Networking Simulation Projects
projects.description: Network topologies and configurations using Cisco Packet Tracer, testing routing, switching, and IP scenarios.
projects.longDescription: Advanced network simulations demonstrating complex routing protocols, VLAN configuration, and network security implementations.
